plot: Paulin Broquet, the great Parisian detective, has brought the notorious bandit, Zigomar, to justice. Determined not to let the law punish him, he had taken poison in the Hall of Justice. ...
title: Zigomar, peau d'anguille - Épisode 1: La résurrection de Zigomar
